name: R4B-TriggerDefinition-R5-TriggerDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B TriggerDefinition into FHIR R5

element.display: Defines an expected trigger for a module

target.display: Defines an expected trigger for a module
target.comment: R4B `TriggerDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition`
R4B `TriggerDefinition.condition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.condition`
R4B `TriggerDefinition.data` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.data`
R4B `TriggerDefinition.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.extension`
R4B `TriggerDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.id`

element.display: Name or URI that identifies the event

target.display: Name or URI that identifies the event
target.comment: R4B `TriggerDefinition.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.name`
R4B `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]`

element.display: named-event | periodic | data-changed | data-added | data-modified | data-removed | data-accessed | data-access-ended

target.display: named-event | periodic | data-changed | data-added | data-modified | data-removed | data-accessed | data-access-ended
target.comment: R4B `TriggerDefinition.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `TriggerDefinition.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/trigger-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/trigger-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
